messages.subject: Melaleuca -response from Digest 737
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Nanci, Glad you asked about Melaleuca.  Basically all I do is set up accounts for the company and they pay me for that, they deliver the products, they
messages.messageBody:
Hi Nanci,

Glad you asked about Melaleuca. Basically all I do is set up accounts
for the company and they pay me for that, they deliver the products,
they handle the money (I have no inventory, paperwork or money to keep
track of). I look for a need, I often talk to parents. Parents,
especially families of young children NEED this product, I joined when
my son was two. I'm so glad I did! I've been sharing it with folks who
are looking for these products and/or need extra money with a business
that make complete sense. (feel free to e-mail me directly so I can
give you the benifit of hearing about this fully and properly)

By the way, I'm Pagan too. I also attend a United Methodist Church with
a Pagan friendly Pastor (he knows I Pagan)

See ya, I'm helping a friend at a yard sale.

Sherry
